resources.string:
This application collects your audio samples to study emotional state on the basis of voice tone.
This application uses network connection to upload your audio samples to secure server. Your profile information or audio samples will be used only for research purpose and will not be shared without permission.

If you agree, please press "Continue".
This is a simple audio recorder.
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?
1. Little interest or pleasure in doing things
3. Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
4. Feeling tired or having little energy
6. Feeling bad about yourself, or that you are a failure, or have let yourself or your family down
7. Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
8. Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed. Or the opposite being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
9. Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way
3. People in Canada come from many racial or cultural groups. You may belong to more than one group on the following list. Are you:
4. Please specify your level of fluency in English communication (speak, understand, read, and write):
5. Education level (highest completed, or currently being ongoing)
6. Have you ever been diagnosed with depression?
7. Do you currently take any medications for depression?
